intro: Grab a warm blanket and get comfortable for more object-seeking!
description:
The fun first sequel in the series that proves that home is where the heart is! 
Take a nature hike, chill by the pool, and fire up the backyard grill while you hone your skills in each challenging level! 
While you're here, customize your room with decorations and furnishings, purchase items from a vast inventory, and make your space your own! Welcome home!

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Keep the fun going with eight exclusive locations!
- Chill out with the exclusive music player!
- Eight bonus and replayable mini-games just for you!
